interestingcomments.content:
Problems with Snapbridge and D7500 for GPS data. /!/ When I owned and used my D3400, the SnapBridge app worked perfectly.  I would keep my phone in my pocket, never touching it, turn on the camera, snap some shots, and everything was synced.  Now, with my D7500, it's a very rare occasion that I can get the GPS datas to transfer over.  It seems as if I need to have my phone in hand, with the app open before they connect, and then I can get it to capture the GPS info..  I am currently using Bluetooth, vs Wifi, so wasn't sure if that mattered, and I am also shooting Raw, if that matters at all..

Other than buying the GPS Module for it, anyone have a better way, or a better app, to be able to get the GPS info linked to photos?
